p: The data set for the LGM climate was downloaded from the WorldClim database at a resolution of 2.5 min and projected using the species’ current bioclimatic niche onto past climate layers. To construct the LGM potential distributions, we projected the model in both general circulation models: the Community Climate System Model (CCSM; Collins et al., 2006) and the model for interdisciplinary research on climate (MIROC Version 3.2; Hasumi & Emori, 2004).
